A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: wow. no character development... the original star wars you would know luke was the man... this weird movie tries to make everyone the main character. It starts with Bombers that have gravity bombs....in space..... this movie has too many problems with it. not going to a theater to watch the next one\, going to wait for red box.
